pages.text: $(li)Wrench is a tool which can be used to rotate blocks or entities like $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/armor_stand)Armor Stands$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frames$(/l).$(br)$(li)The rotation axis will be the one of the face you click.
$(li)Left click in the desired block while you are holding the Wrench in your hand to rotate it.
